question.title: To get Date witout time stamp in java

node.contents: How can i get a date instance without a time stamp in java? Ex: 2013-05-23( date instance)

astNode.text: How can i get a date instance without a time stamp in java? Ex: 2013-05-23( date instance)

node.contents: Create a Calendar object to store the date, clear out the time fields, and then get the resulting date:

astNode.text: Create a Calendar object to store the date, clear out the time fields, and then get the resulting date:

elements.contents: Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); cal.setTime(dateYouWantToTruncate); cal.clear(Calendar.HOUR); cal.clear(Calendar.MINUTE); cal.clear(Calendar.SECOND); cal.clear(Calendar.MILLISECOND); Date dateOnly = cal.getTime();

units.rawText: Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); calsetTime(dateYouWantToTruncate); cal.clear(Calendar.HOUR); cal.clear(Calendar.MINUTE); cal.clear(Calendar.SECOND); cal.clear(Calendar.MILLISECOND); Date dateOnly = cal.getTime();
